error.networkError: Oops, looks like something went wrong with our servers. Please try again later.
error.somethingWrong: Something isn't right. Please try again later.
error.passwordWeak: Password must be at least 8 characters

tasks.title: My Tasks

deleteTaskModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
deleteTaskModal.body: This action is not reversible and could have adverse effects on your GoalWise score.

tasks.noRoutine: You have no routine scheduled for this day.

login.desc: It's like having a credit score. Track how well you hold yourself accountable.
login.invalidCredentials: Invalid username/password. Please check your credentials and try again.

consistency.title: Consistency
consistency.content: The more consistent you are, the better your score.

taskCount.title: Task Count
taskCount.content: Having multiple tasks in your routine adds to your accountability.

accountAge.title: Account Age
accountAge.content: The longer you have been consistent, the better your score.

taskRetention.title: Task Retention
taskRetention.content: Not deleting tasks that you have committed to proves your accountability.
